Package de.lessvoid.xml.tools

package de.lessvoid.xml.tools
  • Class
    Description
    BundleInfo
    A Helper to load ResourceBundles from baseNames AND from already loaded ResourceBundles.
    BundleInfoBasename
    A BundleInfo that will use a basename to resolve a ResourceBundle.
    BundleInfoResourceBundle
    A BundleInfo that will use an already existing ResourceBundle.
    ClassHelper
    Helper to get Class from class name.
    MethodInvoker
    A object and a method for the object.
    MethodResolver
    MethodResolver helper class.
